life-stories.name: Life Stories
life-stories.html:
Luxoft Life stories

Our people

How We Work Now: 5 Keys To Effective Remote Leadership

While I may lead a global, remote team now, that wasn’t always my reality. I used to work in an office. When that was the only way I knew work to be, it felt fine. Productive, normal, comfortable.

Events

How We Worked in 2022: Product Update Roundup

There's no doubt about it: The old ways of work are dead. It's time to find new ways of work that work for all of us—independent talent, small business owners, and large companies alike. We've spent this year focused on all the different ways that we can help you, our customers, as you define what work looks like to you now.

Our people

The Luxoft Foundation Grants $1.68 Million To Help People Displaced By Conflict Find Work—No Matter Their Location

When conflict forces someone to flee their home, the crisis doesn’t end when they get to a safer place. The displacement can last for years, disrupting everything, including their ability to earn a living. The inability to find work isn’t just a barrier to essentials like food, shelter, and healthcare—it can also inhibit a sense of well-being, belonging, pride, and stability.

Blog

The Luxoft Foundation Grants $1.68 Million To Help People Displaced By Conflict Find Work—No Matter Their Location

When conflict forces someone to flee their home, the crisis doesn’t end when they get to a safer place. The displacement can last for years, disrupting everything, including their ability to earn a living. The inability to find work isn’t just a barrier to essentials like food, shelter, and healthcare—it can also inhibit a sense of well-being, belonging, pride, and stability.

why-attend.name: Why Attend
why-attend.html:
Why attend

Dive deep into the fascinating universe of industrial networking! Join us for an insightful evening as we uncover the intricate facets of networking automation and delve into the marvels of precise time synchronization in industrial contexts.

Expert insights

Learn from industry leaders as they share their knowledge, experience and invaluable tips.

Career path exploration

Contemplate a rewarding career in networking QA automation and discover what it truly takes to shine in this role.

Technical deep dive

Gain a robust understanding of the Precision Time Protocol (PTP) and its paramount importance in industrial networks. Plus, witness a live demo that brings the concept to life.
